Book Club for Psychical Development

Current Books

  • The Invisible Landscape by Terence McKenna
    A deep dive into the nature of reality and consciousness.
  • The Roots of Coincidence by Arthur Koestler
    Explores the concept of synchronicity and its implications.
  • Entangled Minds by Dean Radin
    Examines the scientific evidence for psychic phenomena.
